name: Portal Knights
description: The world of Elysia needs YOU! Join this cooperative, 3D sandbox action RPG to level up your character, craft epic weapons, conquer enemies in real-time, and build almost anything! Craft your adventure. Forge your hero. Become the ultimate Portal Knight!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: AMD Phenom(tm) 8450 Triple-Core Processor (3 CPUs), ~2.1GHz or Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 @ 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIAÂ® GeForce GTX 470 (1Gb VRAM) / ATI Radeon TM HD 6870 (1Gb VRAM) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: On Board
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, 4.0 GHz Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, 4 GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: On Board
